First, the two times that I have stayed in 2018 they did not credit my Marriott Rewards correctly.  I contacted Marriott Rewards on numerous occasions and they never fixed it correctly.  Near the end of 2018 I quit staying in this location because if they couldn't accurately credit my points, then I would rather stay elsewhere.  I stayed again last week to see if under the new Bonvoy program that they maybe finally got this straightened out.  Waiting to see what the point value will be for this
Manager Response: Dear csnapp12,  Thank you for your loyalty towards our brand and sharing about your stay once again at Irvine Marriott. We are glad to read that you loved our M-Club lounge, but we are sorry for the noise issues you encountered and the inconvenience it caused. Our front desk is available to resolve issues, so we are sorry we were not aware of the noise problem, as we would have been happy to try & resolve the issue or move you to another room. Please give us another chance as we would love to provide you with a better experience and a good night's rest!  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: Room was ok but we were missing a bathrobe and slippers for that price. Only a shuttle to the John Wayne airport, not to a shopping mall our outlet mall we always needed to take a taxi or uber. The rooml was clean and friendly staff but we feel for the price we could have a bit more services especially the hotel is quite far from restaurants . Free water in the entrance !
Manager Response: Dear RITA Z,  We appreciate you sharing your concerns. Our top priority is excellent service, so we apologize for our failure to provide you with the appropriate items you requested. We will share your feedback with our team and discuss ways to improve our service to our guests so inconveniences such as this do not occur in the future. Thanks for choosing us and we hope this does not prevent you from returning. We would welcome the opportunity to show you this is not typical and provide the service you deserve from us every visit.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary Heading: Checking in and out was a terrible experience
Summary: Beware, although the hotel is renovated and has nice amenities  the customer service is way below expectations.  At check in I was provided by the wrong information that resulted in an overcharge on my bill.  When checking out on Sunday there was a lineup of people with no one at the front desk. After more than half an hour two came out to wait on us  Communicating with the front desk was really hard and when I used my app to request services I did not get them until the next day when I requested them again.
Manager Response: Dear AABSLE,  On behalf of our entire team, we deeply apologize for the issues you experienced with our associates during your recent visit. Thank you for sharing your observations so we may analyze and correct what we did wrong to improve going forward. When you have a moment, please contact our hotel directly and we will be happy to resolve any remaining discrepancies that reflect in your account. We appreciate your patience and hope to have another chance to provide you with the outstanding hospitality you should receive every time you are our guest.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: We spent one night at the Marriott in connection with a business conference taking place at the hotel.  The self-parking was easy and not unreasonable at $12.  The reception was very friendly and informative.  Special effort to make sure we received our Marriott points.  The room was clean and comfortable.  We were placed on the â€œquietâ€ side of the hotel, but the hotel is located so close to the freeway that freeway noise was unmistakeable, if muted.  We had a nice late dinner in the lobby-level restaurant despite slow service and noisy bar; the food was good.  The conference facilities were pretty standard.  I didnâ€™t get a chance to use the fitness facility, but was told on arrival that it was open 24 hours.  Hotel is close to the airport in an industrial park setting.
Manager Response: Dear michaelj726,   Thank you for choosing Irvine Marriott while here for business. We are glad we met most of your expectations and that you were especially pleased with our convenient location. Thank you again for your kind comments, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: I had stayed at this Marriott several  times in the past, but when I stayed recently  for a conference,  I was impressed with their renovated rooms and the M Club on the lobby floor. When I checked in, I was welcomed back as a Marriott member and reminded that I can access the M Club and bring an additional guest, which I did.  In the past when I stayed here, I didn't even know they had this lounge.  I took the Marriott shuttle from SNA airport to the hotel, it leaves at 15 after and 45 after the hour.  I also took the shuttle back to the airport, very convenient since the distance is quite short. A great stay overall.
Manager Response: Dear Ellen T,  Thank you for sharing about your stay at Irvine Marriott and for being our loyal guest. We are glad you liked our modern rooms and that our shuttle service worked well for you. We can't wait to see you back soon!  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary Heading: Consistent with what I expect from Marriott, but the parking fees are outrageous for a suburban hotel
Summary: This property is excellent in nearly all facets.  All members of the staff were friendly.  The room was clean and comfortable, and had a "modern" feel about it.  The lobby is spacious and comfortable.  A few additional comments:  1. The hotel runs a complimentary shuttle to and from John Wayne Airport on the half hour.  But, I chose to take advantage of the nice weather and walk in both directions.  It is an easy walk, about 20 minutes in each direction (assuming you have wheeled luggage that is not unwieldy).  It can be a little tricky to find the pedestrian exit to/from the airport parking garage out to MacArthur Blvd.  It's located adjacent to the MacArthur Blvd/ Michelson Dr. intersection, just a tad south of the IHOP.  2. I like that the room was not carpeted.  The flooring

As in every city, certain times of the year are busier and command higher rates, nonetheless, we definitely make every effort to be priced competitively. Summary: Situated within walking distance of the airportâ€¦donâ€™t worry, there are not enough flights to have nonstop noiseâ€¦the Irvine Marriott delivers the true Marriott experience.  From the front desk to the guest rooms and everything in-between.  The staff are exceptionally kind, considerate and approachable.  The service at the in-hotel Starbucks is as good as any Starbucks I have been to.  The concierge lounge breakfast has a little bit of everything and I enjoy the two times I was there.  My room was comfy, the balcony was a plus as I left the door open all day and was ale to return to a comfy, breezy room, free from the AC.  Despite the large crowds, it never felt crowded.  I dined at Floe twice and it was delicious each time.  Prices are hotel typical, for sure.  California hotel
Manager Response: Dear allenr589,  Thank you for being our guest at Irvine Marriott and for being loyal to our brand. We are glad you had a pleasant and comfortable stay and that you liked the friendly service provided by our attentive staff. Thank you again for the kind review, and we look forward to having you as our guest again.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: I stay here quite a bit- it's always clean and the property looks great and is modern.  Great service from the staff.  The gentleman who checked me in (and has before)...I think his name is Stephen- always brings his A game.  Fast, friendly and extremely efficient- a great employee!
Manager Response: Dear vb9594,   Thank you for sharing about your experience at Irvine Marriott. We love having guests return to stay with us again and again. It is rewarding to know that our team left a great impression as they work tirelessly to provide the best service, down to the smallest detail. We appreciate your compliments and will share them with Stephen. Thanks for your repeat business, and we look forward to your next visit.   George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: We stayed two nights in a King room. We were there to reconnect with dear friends we had not seen for years. The hotel could not have been more friendly or helpful. My friend requires an accessible room and some special considerations, and her needs were met with great care. Our room was clean and lovely. We had room service dinner the first night and it was delicious and served beautifully. Our meals in the restaurant - especially breakfast! were  womderful, and the waitstaff was friendly and accommodating.  We spent hours sitting by the fire in the lounge, and it was the perfect spot to catch up.  We will stay there again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear curlygramma,   Thank you for choosing Irvine Marriott and for the kind review. We have an exceptional team whose top priority is making sure every guest is comfortable and satisfied, so we look forward to sharing your compliments with them. It was our pleasure serving you and your friends, and we look forward to having you all as our guest again.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: This Marriott is located across the street from the Orange County Airport (John Wayne) and has great access to the area.  The decor is modern and the quality of the hotel is what you would expect from Marriott.  The rooms have both 110V outlets as well as USB connections at the desk and bedside tables.  All the staff are very friendly, especially the folks working at the Starbucks!  The M Club is adjacent to the restaurant and is very nice.  The only negative aspect of the rooms is that one side of the hotel faces the 405 Freeway from which the noise may be an issue for some people, even on the higher floors.
Manager Response: Dear Curt S,  Thank you for choosing Irvine Marriott. We are glad we met most of your expectations and that you had a great time with us. Thank you again for taking the time to write about your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: We are Marriott Platinum members, stayed 1 night to visit some relatives. The lobby was very modern, spacious, lively and inviting. Similarly, the M Club was clean, spacious and well-stocked. Our room on the 15th floor looked new and was tastefully decorated with clean lines. We appreciated the large flat-screen TV and had a good night sleep on the most comfortable bed.  The only downside was the additional parking fee but the hotel offers great value if you can use their free shuttle which runs often to the nearby John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Dear calwinelover2015,  As a member of Marriott Rewards, we appreciate your loyalty to our brands, and we are so glad we could welcome you at the Irvine Marriott. Thanks for mentioning our comfortable, immaculately designed rooms, all of which feature plush bedding, spacious bathrooms, soundproof windows and a wealth of helpful amenities. We look forward to welcoming you again soon.   George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: I want to preface this review as I have stayed over 130+ nights in a hotel just this year and usually stay at Marriott/SPG Properties. This hotel is located very close to the airport and a great place for business travelers. The hotel is hip, fun, and  has a good environment for after hours in the M Club lounge. I was very impressed by the lounge as it had great snacks and offerings. We value your feedback and have taken a note of it. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Please rest assured, we have taken your concerns and addressed them with our leadership team as it is important for us to learn about the areas in which we can enhance our guest experience.  .  I do hope that you will come back to our hotel again in the future.  Warmest regards,  George Assaf, Hotel Operations Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Marriott Irvine between two flights and just expected a clean place to crash - it was so much more! The rooms are fantastic with all kinds of fun amenities (M-Beta), smart TV was super useful, comfortable bed, quiet room, kind staff from the valet to the front desk.  Would 100% recommend.
Manager Response: Dear pinkfedora,   Thanks for the recommendation. We are happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate you mentioning our comfortable, immaculately designed rooms, all of which feature plush bedding and a wealth of helpful amenities. Thank you for sharing your wonderful comments, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Irvine Marriott!  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: Stayed over for two nights on a business trip. Free shuttle to airport. Service all around the property was great. The property itself was updated, clean and very nice. Rooms were comfortable and spacious.
Manager Response: Dear PTycz,   Thank you for your wonderful feedback regarding your stay at Irvine Marriott. We appreciate you letting fellow travelers know how much you enjoyed your time here. Thanks for mentioning our newly remodeled facilities, it's nice to hear our guests are loving our new look! It was a pleasure having you, and we hope to see you again very soon.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary Heading: No respect for MARRIOTT ELITE TRAVELERS

OK, no worries here, thank you.  Check out, parking is on bill, immediately call front desk, told they would check in on it and call back, no response.  Because I could not identify their front desk person by name, had to pay!  OK, not a big deal, ($64), but indicative of how still another property handles Marriott's most loyal customers.  On a brighter note, M CLUB is still wonderful!

We truly appreciate your business and look forward to making it up to you on your next visit.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Neither is room service.  I know all hotels are trying to get away from traditional, money-losing room service but, this hotel has taken its dislike for room service to new heights (or should I say new lows). We appreciate your patience and hope you will stay with us again for a flawless experience.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: Irvine Marriott is a new favorite I hope I have a chance to stay at more often. Convenient location near the freeway and SNA airport, this place is a spacious, well maintained and has a gorgeous campus.   The bar area and pool area are all the good things about California and the rooms have been modernized with enough plugs and well designed spaces. It twas quiet and comfortable.   I want to give a shout out to Tim, part of the front desk staff. He stood out - he checked me in and became my go-to during my multi-day stay. He was professional, personable, conversation and friendly. I was there for a conference (at the hotel) and he helped me with some of those logistics as well as just being helpful to me as a guest. If only other hotels could clone him!
Manager Response: Dear Andrea K,  Thank you for sharing about your stay at Irvine Marriott. We appreciate the generous remarks and are glad you could enjoy the best of Orange County with us. We understand the importance of the details that make up a great stay and are happy knowing our location, facilities, and the service provided by Tim enhanced your visit with us. We can't wait to see you again soon!  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: Stayed at Irvine Marriott during a class reunion.  Lots of details to attend to so it was wonderfulnto have such a restful and well appointed  hotel at the end of the day.  The restaurant downstairs has a great chef as well and the staff was friendly and helpful. Great spot...I would definitely go back.
Manager Response: Dear Margie D,  Thank you for sharing about your stay at Irvine Marriott. We appreciate the generous remarks and are glad you could enjoy the best of Orange County with us.  We can't wait to see you again soon.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: I had not stayed at this Marriott in a long time.  Everything seemed to be updated.  Nice room with a walk in shower. MClub was nicer than standard concierge lounge.  Gym was much larger than standard Marriott facility.   Very nice hotel and experience.

Thank you again for mentioning our newly remodeled facilities and accommodations, it's wonderful to read our guests are loving our new look! It was a pleasure having you, and we can't wait to see you again very soon.  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: Stayed here to be close to SNA airport as I had a flight the following day. Beautiful hotel lobby, big rooms with a big screen smart TV which was excellent for catching up on my Netflix shows and movies. Room had adequate storage space, a safe , coffee maker , and a large bathroom. There is a Starbucks at the lobby which is convenient. I did not eat at the restaurants but ordered room service , took about 20 min for preparation and delivery. There are many other restaurants close to the hotel , and the hotel provides a list with phone numbers which I thought was helpful if needed. Access to fitness center , open 24 hrs . Check in was painless,  I was able to check in online and picked up my key on arrival which took less than 5 minutes. Staff at the front desk was very pleasant
Manager Response: Dear NBONP,  Thank you for the great review! It is always exciting to know that we met all your expectations and we are glad you enjoyed your stay. The Irvine Marriott is the perfect place with our newly renovated hotel featuring contemporary style and comfort. It was our pleasure serving you, and we can't wait to see you again soon.   George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

The Irvine Marriott has plenty of parking in both the front and back, through the parking garage in the back is misleading as only the lower floor of the garage appears open for Marriott customers.  I used Mobile Key at this property so didn't have any interactions for check in but the mobile key worked great and I was in my room in no time.  The WiFi was excellent and I had no issues there.  There is a Starbucks in the lobby for those that like to partake in those beverages.  The M Club lounge in the Irvine Marriott is the best part of this hotel for those that have elite privileges. Summary Heading: A little noisy, but solid option
Summary: The location is good and the amenities are adequate. I found the rooms a bit on the small side and with noise coming from the hallways waking me up at times.  The noise insulation is fairly poor and could also hear people above me.... Otherwise, a clean place, updated and modern. The lounge for elite members was top-class, serving food and drinks and offered plenty of comfortable space for a quiet conversation and a wind-down.
Manager Response: Dear travelfromOhio,  Thank you for sharing about your stay at Irvine Marriott and for being loyal to our brand. We appreciate the generous remarks and are glad you could enjoy the best of Orange County with us. We understand the importance of the details that make up a great stay and are happy knowing our ideal location, amenities, and facilities enhanced your visit with us. However, weâ€™re sorry for the inconvenience caused due to the noise. We hope to see you again soon!  George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: The lobby is so LOUD that you can't have a phone call. The bar and restaurant and patio are worse. There is LOUD/BAD music even in the elevators! Overall, they seem to be trying to be a hip W style hotel  and sadly missing the boat. This is an ordinary convention hotel and making it LOUD with HORRIBLE music just makes it an awful experience. The line to check in was a 25 minute wait because of all the poeple in line. I had hoped the room would be quiet, but it is not soundproofed and you hear the planes every few minutes. The "balcony" is a cement montrosity overlooking the street with NO furniture - why bother having a balcony??

Summary: Love all the quotes throughout the hotel floor and especially the gym. The people who designed the gym definitely had inspiration in mind with the funny quotes on the mirrors and throughout the gym!   Iâ€™ve stayed at the other nearby Marriott that has a view of the ocean and while that was beautiful, this hotel has a more urban/modern feel. My room looked almost new with just a few touch ups needed such as refinishing the tub and there was a random rectangle hole by the bed that probably used to have a lamp. The staff were also very friendly

Summary: I went to a conference and spent 5 nights there. The hotel has been remodeled and they did a great job. The lobby, bar/restaurant area are all really nice and even have a Starbucks! The room was great too. The TV was quite large and allows you to logon to your Netflix account to watch movies. I haven't come across this before so it was a nice surprise. The staff was friendly and helpful as you would expect at a Marriott and they did a great job of handling our conference.

It was our pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit.   George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Summary: Went to Newport Beach for mt daughter's skimboarding competiton and was thrilled to find this Marriott at a super reasonable price.  It's about a 15-20 min drive to the beach but worth it! It felt like we were staying at a lil retreat of our own.  Everything was up to Marriott Standards!! Lovely hotel, great staff!! Will come again and highly recommend!!

Thanks once more, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   George Assaf Director of Hotel Operations

Checkin experience was great - cannot recall the young ladies name but great smile and welcoming attitude.  Only one person that I came in contact with at front desk (4Am in the morning) was not personable or helpful.  This will be my new go to hotel in OC.

Summary: This was our 2nd visit to this hotel in Irvine. It is mainly a business hotel but we have really enjoyed both stays here when we just needed a night or two away as we live about 30 mins away.
